name: CVVID
tag_list: recruitment, employment, jobs, cv, resume, video-cv, job-application
overview:
Providing a complete online CV profile with CV video.

Making jobseekers stand out and helping them to sell themselves. Employers benefit by saving time, money and resources spent on browsing paper CV’s and interviewing candidates.

Users can upload their document CV and a short video selling their skills to the employer. Once complete they can send to employers via a unique URL which allows the employer to view by logging in or registering to the site. Users receive feedback from the employer and trace which employers have shown interest in them.

Our mobile App will allow users to create and upload their CV video to their account. With clear and easy to follow instructions it will help create a script and record in short segments. A user friendly method of creating their first CV video and educating the early adopters.
